Translations.Text: Hakuiki araku shingeki suru (uma) ni oite (chikau)
(teki no) gunzei no mattadanaka ni totsunyu suru toki
Hontoni ningen wa, jibun no omo ni taishi onshirazudearu
Sore ni tsuki, kare wa makotoni shonindeari
mata tomi o aisuru koto ni netchu suru
Kare wa haka no naka no mono ga abaki dasa reru toki no koto o shiranai no ka
Mata mune no naka ni aru mono ga, bakuro sa reru no o
Hontoni omo wa, sonohi, kare-ra ni tsuite subete shitte ora reru
